column4: So once I find Black And White 2 in the WineHQ search, then what? Can I like download it or something?
the appdb just gives you information as to whether or not it's fully supported

This channel is here to answer support questions related to Ubuntu. If you have a support question ask it. If you have other things you'd like to say you can join #ubuntu-offtopic, and ##windows is for Windows chat
